job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Generative AI, including Large Language Models (LLMs), embeddings, vector databases, and integrating both external (OpenAI) and internal models. The role involves building solutions that directly impact customers and provide services to other teams, aligning with the development of user-facing applications and AI platforms.

evidence.phrase: Our goal is to help our customers provide the best possible experience to their end-users.
evidence.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the company's overarching business objective and how technology contributes to customer satisfaction.

evidence.phrase: Building solutions that affect customers directly through the customer-facing products built by the team, but also providing services to other product teams within CM.com to facilitate their ability to adopt AI into their products and services.
evidence.justification: This highlights the role's impact on both external customers and internal business units, demonstrating an understanding of how AI solutions serve different business needs.

evidence.phrase: gain familiarity and work with AI concepts like embeddings, vector databases
evidence.justification: Embeddings and vector databases are fundamental components in many GenAI applications, often requiring data preparation and management, which falls under data engineering principles.
Directly states the team's focus on Generative AI, which is a core area of modeling.

evidence.phrase: working on expanding CM.com's innovative AI platform
evidence.justification: Implies the development, adaptation, or integration of AI models as part of a platform.

evidence.phrase: gain familiarity and work with AI concepts like embeddings, vector databases, Natural Language Processing, and state-of-the-art Large Language Models.
evidence.justification: These are all core concepts and technologies within the domain of AI modeling, particularly generative AI.

evidence.phrase: Working with services and models available in the market like OpenAI, but also working on integrating CM.com's own language models, and the services around those models.
evidence.justification: This explicitly mentions working with and integrating LLMs, which is a key aspect of generative AI modeling.

evidence.phrase: you'll be joining our Generative AI team. This is a multidisciplinary team consisting of senior back-end engineers, front-end engineers, devops engineers, and data scientists.
evidence.justification: Indicates collaboration with and contribution to a software development team, suggesting the role involves building software components.

evidence.phrase: you'll be expected to provide meaningful contributions to our back-end stack consisting primarily of Python
evidence.justification: Directly states involvement in back-end development using Python, a common language for building software applications.

evidence.phrase: Building solutions that affect customers directly through the customer-facing products built by the team
evidence.justification: Implies the development of user-facing applications or features powered by AI.

evidence.phrase: providing services to other product teams within CM.com to facilitate their ability to adopt AI into their products and services.
evidence.justification: Suggests building reusable software services or APIs that other teams can integrate.

evidence.phrase: working on integrating CM.com's own language models, and the services around those models.
evidence.justification: Developing or integrating services around AI models is a software development task.

evidence.phrase: All of this in an environment where scalability, maintainability, and adaptability are the top priority
evidence.justification: These are key considerations in robust software development, especially for production systems.

evidence.phrase: This is a multidisciplinary team consisting of senior back-end engineers, front-end engineers, devops engineers, and data scientists.
evidence.justification: The presence of 'devops engineers' in the team suggests an operational focus and collaboration on deployment and maintenance.

evidence.phrase: All of this in an environment where scalability, maintainability, and adaptability are the top priority
evidence.justification: Scalability and maintainability are crucial aspects of MLOps, ensuring models can run reliably in production.

evidence.phrase: in a landscape that's shifting on a weekly basis.
evidence.justification: This implies a need for continuous integration, deployment, and adaptation of models and systems, which are MLOps concerns.

soft_skills.skill: work together every day to overcome any challenge
adapt, contribute and innovate together with your colleagues
improve your skills and capabilities, both professionally and in soft skills
collaborate with a diverse group of talented individuals
